content.text: Match ends, Borussia Dortmund 2, Marseille 3.
Second Half ends, Borussia Dortmund 2, Marseille 3.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Ayew (Marseille) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

Foul by Jordan Ayew (Marseille).
Jakub Blaszczykowski (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 2, Marseille 3. Mathieu Valbuena (Marseille) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by André Ayew.
Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 2, Marseille 2. André Ayew (Marseille) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Morgan Amalfitano with a cross following a corner.
